titles.title: A bill to extend, temporarily, daylight saving time, and for other purposes.
A bill to extend, temporarily, daylight saving time, and for other purposes.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 548.

bill.summary: This bill extends daylight saving time through November 7, 2021.
